name: Loopies: Robots that Loop
description:
A small game where you must use pressure plates and rotators to guide your Loopies across the map to collect goals, and then all the way back to their spawn to do it again.

Normal Loopies (orange) do normal Loopy Things!

Lazy Loopies (green) only walk when there  is another Loopy  nearby!

Dashing Loopies (blue) get faster the longer they head in a straight line!
